job_history.work_description: Maintain detailed record of budgetary transaction for annual operation of the SAO(State Aviation Office) budget. Managed accounting operations, accounting close, account reporting and reconciliations. Prepared financial and regulatory reports required by laws, regulations or boards of directors.

Analyzed funding for Oklahoma National Guard Aviation Flying Hour Program, Counter-Narcotics Program, and Additional Flight training Periods to aid effectiveness and to identify deficient areas or trends. Independently or as assigned undertakes projects which involves surveys, comparisons and studies of current and past operations.

Developing procedures and administrative processes concerning the preparation and execution of the Oklahoma National Guard Mobilization and Training budgets totaling over $100 million dollars by accurately and timely analyzing and evaluating each budget ensuring achievement of department priorities and mission objectives are met.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing and analyzing budgets for large-scale government operations, including the Oklahoma National Guard Mobilization and Training budgets, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed funding for various government programs, identifying deficient areas or trends, and prepared financial reports, suggesting strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Accounting Operations
skills.explanation: Managed accounting operations, including accounting close, account reporting, and reconciliations, indicating strong proficiency in accounting operations.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Prepared financial and regulatory reports required by laws, regulations, or boards of directors, suggesting strong proficiency in financial reporting.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Independently undertook projects involving surveys, comparisons, and studies of current and past operations, indicating a solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed budgetary transactions and funding for various government programs, indicating a solid working proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: No direct leadership experience mentioned, but managed accounting operations and prepared financial reports, suggesting some practical experience in leadership.
